questions.title: 女孩一个人走夜路是很危险的。
questions.answer: It is too dangerous to walk alone at night for a girl.

questions.title: 让小孩玩火是很危险的。
questions.answer: It is dangerous to let children play with fire.

questions.title: 过马路不走斑马线是很危险的。
questions.answer: It is dangerous to cross the road without zebra stripe.

questions.title: 下雨天站在大树下是很危险的。
questions.answer: It is dangerous to stand under a big tree in the rainy days.

questions.title: 带汽油上汽车是很危险的。
questions.answer: It is too dangerous to take gasoline to the bus.

title: ——不要再闹脾气了，你这样做是很危险的。
——我不想听。

answer.en: Please don't be out of temper, it is too dangerous for you to do it.
It's dangerous to go to Yunnan alone.
I want to touch the black dog.
It is dangerous to do that, it is so big！
